name: ASUS ZenScreen 16” Portable USB Monitor (MB169CK) - Full HD, IPS, Dual USB-C, Mini-HDMI, Eye Care, Flicker Free, Blue Light Filter, Anti-Glare Surface, 360° Kickstand, 3 yr Warranty
short_description: 15.6-inch Full HD portable anti-glare IPS display with an ultraslim and thin design helps you get things done more efficiently when you’re on the go
USB Type-C connector (DP Alt mode) for user convenience and compatibility with compatible devices
ASUS Eye Care monitors feature TÜV Rheinland-certified Flicker-free and Low Blue Light technologies to ensure a comfortable viewing experience
Automatically sense its orientation and switch the monitor between landscape and portrait modes via DisplayWidget Center software
User-friendly design with embedded tripod socket on the rear and 360° kickstand for versatility.
What’s in the box: 360° kickstand, USB-C cable, Mini HDMI to HDMI cable, ZenScreen sleeve, Warranty Card, Quick start guide
3-month Adobe Creative Cloud: Receive complimentary access with the purchase of this product (valid from 9/1/2023 to 8/31/2025)
product_description: The ASUS ZenScreen™ is the perfect companion for life on the road. This sleek, lightweight portable display boasts a slim profile, making it easy to pack in any travel bag and ready to boost your productivity anytime, anywhere. The MB169CK offers versatile connectivity with dual USB-C and mini-HDMI ports. With just a single USB-C cable, you can quickly duplicate or extend your laptop screen. USB-C handles both power and video signals, ensuring a simple plug-and-play experience for enhanced work efficiency, as long as your laptop has a USB-C port that supports DP Alt mode.

product_description: The MSI PRO MP161 E2 portable monitor features a sharp 15.6"" Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS panel with eye-friendly technology and an ergonomic fold-out kickstand that supports both horizontal and vertical display orientations. Designed to improve work productivity for anyone on the go, the monitor features a 60Hz refresh rate (4ms GtG response time) and multiple eye-friendly features, including TÜV Rheinland Eye Comfort certified Less Blue Light and anti-flicker technology, as well as anti-glare screen finishing to reduce eye strain. Additional quality features include a 0° ~ 180° lengthened fold-out kickstand designed to support both portrait or landscape formats, 1/4-inch tripod mount support, dual built-in 1.5W speakers for conference calls, L-shaped cable plugs for secure wired connections, and Display Kit App support for advanced colour & display settings. Connectivity options include mini-HDMI 2.0b and dual USB Type-C ports for versatile device support. Compatible with PC, Mac, laptop, and mobile devices.
